products.title: Medical Tourism Package

products.description2: Includes a full medical check-up and specialized treatments.

products.title: Mountain Hiking Adventure
products.description: A thrilling hiking adventure in the mountains with professional guides.
products.description2: Suitable for all fitness levels, with routes of varying difficulty.

products.description: An eco-friendly safari experience in the wildlife reserve.
products.description2: Guided tours focusing on wildlife conservation and sustainable practices.
